headline.main: An Explanation of Wild Birds' Role in Avian Flu Outbreak
headline.print_headline: An Explanation of Wild Birds' Role in Avian Flu Outbreak

docs.snippet: Wild birds are believed to be behind the first major widespread outbreak of bird flu in the United States. The H5N2 virus has cost Midwestern turkey and chicken producers more than 13 million birds since early March, including several new cases an...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wild birds are believed to be behind the first major widespread outbreak of bird flu in the United States. The H5N2 virus has cost Midwestern turkey and chicken producers more than 13 million birds since early March, including several new cases announced in Iowa and Minnesota on Monday. Here are some questions and answers about how wild birds remain healthy even when carrying and spreading the virus.

headline.main: Next-Generation Nuclear Reactors May Not Be Safer: French Watchdog
headline.print_headline: Next-Generation Nuclear Reactors May Not Be Safer: French Watchdog

docs.snippet: The next generation of nuclear reactors being developed in countries such as France, Russia, China and Japan may not be safer than those being built today, French nuclear safety watchdog IRSN said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The next generation of nuclear reactors being developed in countries such as France, Russia, China and Japan may not be safer than those being built today, French nuclear safety watchdog IRSN said on Monday.

headline.main: Oklahoma Sheriff's Official Resigns After Fatal Shooting
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Sheriff's Official Resigns After Fatal Shooting

docs.snippet: The No. 2 official at the Tulsa County Sheriff's Office resigned on Monday, days after release of a report in which subordinates said they felt pressured to support the training records of a reserve deputy who fatally shot a black suspect in early...
docs.lead_paragraph: The No. 2 official at the Tulsa County Sheriff's Office resigned on Monday, days after release of a report in which subordinates said they felt pressured to support the training records of a reserve deputy who fatally shot a black suspect in early April.

headline.main: ESPN Suing Verizon Over Unbundling of Its Sports Channel
headline.print_headline: ESPN Suing Verizon Over Unbundling of Its Sports Channel

docs.snippet: ESPN is suing Verizon in an escalating clash over how the popular sports channel is being sold in a discounted pay-TV package....

headline.main: Longtime South Carolina Sheriff Sentenced to Year in Prison in Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Longtime South Carolina Sheriff Sentenced to Year in Prison in Corruption Case

docs.snippet: The man who was South Carolina's longest-serving sheriff before he pleaded guilty in a public corruption case involving illegal immigrants was sentenced on Monday to a year and a day in federal prison and fined $10,000, a U.S. Attorney's Office sa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The man who was South Carolina's longest-serving sheriff before he pleaded guilty in a public corruption case involving illegal immigrants was sentenced on Monday to a year and a day in federal prison and fined $10,000, a U.S. Attorney's Office said.

headline.main: Singer Amy Winehouse's Father Says New Biopic Misleading
headline.print_headline: Singer Amy Winehouse's Father Says New Biopic Misleading

docs.snippet: A new film about the late British singer Amy Winehouse is misleading, her father said on Monday, and the family of the six-time Grammy Award winner was disassociating itself from the production....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new film about the late British singer Amy Winehouse is misleading, her father said on Monday, and the family of the six-time Grammy Award winner was disassociating itself from the production.

headline.main: Sicilian Court Convicts 20 Somalis of Migrant-Trafficking
headline.print_headline: Sicilian Court Convicts 20 Somalis of Migrant-Trafficking

docs.snippet: A court in Sicily on Monday convicted 20 Somalis who had received political asylum in Italy of a role in a vast criminal organization focused on migrant-smuggling....
docs.lead_paragraph: A court in Sicily on Monday convicted 20 Somalis who had received political asylum in Italy of a role in a vast criminal organization focused on migrant-smuggling.

headline.main: Ex-South Carolina Sheriff Sentenced: 1 Year, 1 Day in Prison
headline.print_headline: Ex-South Carolina Sheriff Sentenced: 1 Year, 1 Day in Prison

docs.snippet: The man who had been South Carolina's longest-serving sheriff was sentenced Monday to one year and one day in prison after pleading guilty in a corruption scheme....
docs.lead_paragraph: The man who had been South Carolina's longest-serving sheriff was sentenced Monday to one year and one day in prison after pleading guilty in a corruption scheme.
